timeline.bodyText: We need to keep the DataSource field with the jndi lookup in the test methods.  Please reinstate the line of code in each method and comment it out, like so //DataSource ds = (DataSource) context.lookup("java:comp/env/jdbc/derby"); This will return the test methods to their original content.
timeline.author: dazavala

timeline.message: Put back the commented datasource initialization lines
